name: Ballad of the Sauftyralian
description:
"Mander - 's isch Zeit!"  -  Tyralian warcry (English meaning undecipherable)

Ayy, it's my small world jam game. I originally had this core idea of merging two small worlds into one, but the power of supreme time management skills gave us this aspiring Super Magnetic Neo sequel nobody asked for instead.

Obligatory disclaimer that we all know and love: Ballad of the Sauftyralian is one of my silly smaller games, so please don't go in expecting something grand, ok? And of course, thanks for playing!

Controls: 

  • Left/Right arrow keys: Move left/right
  • A: Jump (air jump in air)
  • S: Change belt polarity
  • D: Reset level
  • Enter: Start the game
  • Escape: Return to title screen/ Close game during title screen
